title: Opinions on PBE nerfs for Akali, Irelia and LeBlanc?
body:
{{champion:84}} 

** Twilight Shroud (W)**
 - Base duration lowered from 5/5.5/6/6.5/7 to 4/4.5/5/5.5/6
 - Max duration lowered from 8/8.5/9/9.5/10 to 6/6.5/7/7.5/8

{{champion:39}} 

** Defiant Dance (W) **
- cooldown increased from 16/15/14/13/12 to 20/18/16/14/12
- incoming damage reduction lowered from 50% to 40%
- no longer grants a stack of Ionian Fervor (updated)

{{champion:7}} 

**Distortion (W)** cooldown increased from 14/13/12/11/10 to 18/16/14/12/10


-------

Thoughts on these? These aren't straight damage nerfs like most of us expected, but these do address directly at the nuisance they pose:

{{champion:84}} Forced to use her W timely & wisely instead of spamming willy-nilly.
{{champion:39}} Dives are now more punishable should she chose to dove at any dangerous moment.
{{champion:7}} Will be forced to cs more safely for a longer period of time.

Its a whole lot of nothing. Again hitting everything but the actual issue.

Akali can still damage champs with almost no repercussions under the shroud due to her absurd short timeframe after attacking.

Irelia still does what she does with no changes to her efficiency. She still has her immense sustain that is combined with her waveclear.

Leblanc is probably impacted the most before level 7. At lvl7 and getting the needed items it becomes redundant.

To be fair, this is in line with Riot’s general balancing paradigms. Riot believes (and the win rates of those champs seem to back Riot up on this) that these three champs aren’t necessarily overpowered so much as incredibly obnoxious to deal with. As such, Riot’s chosen to nerf their survivability and safety while keeping the mechanics that make them good (Akali and Leblanc’s burst, Irelia’s mobility) untouched. Essentially, the problem is not that the champs are too strong, but rather that the champs don’t have enough windows of vulnerability to exploit.

Honestly, a part of me appreciates that shroud is one of the only defensive abilities in the game that rewards the opponent for having aoe and skill shot abilities instead of targeted abilities.  
   Personal opinions aside, while I agree that increasing re-entry time into shroud would be a really nice change to make one-on-ones with her less obnoxious for most champions, it would also make it exponentially harder for her to survive and do her job in mid-to-late game team fights.
